PageWidgetPortable.Title: Parcelas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_CLI_PARCELAS_CONSULTA.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <DefaultFilterName>Em aberto</DefaultFilterName> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedPageSize>20</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.DOCUMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS B WHERE B.ABRANGENCIA IN('N','T') AND B.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' AND B.EHPREVISAO = 'N' AND B.PESSOA IN (SELECT C.PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS C WHERE C.HANDLE = @USUARIO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
